activities:
Personal information gathered and/or received will be used by the software to generate personalized and customized policy information to be available to the user (employee or employer) for their review.  
The type of information generated and displayed to the user will depend on if user is an employee or the employer. Users' access to the information is only allowed after personalized password protected login.

personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources Data
